00027 //
00028 // REGISTERED USERS
00029 //
00030 //     Here we manage users resigered by mask and their (generic!) properties
00031 //
00032 
00033 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00034 #include "kvi_debug.h"
00035 
00036 #include "KviHeapObject.h"
00037 #include "KviPointerHashTable.h"
00038 #include "KviRegisteredUserGroup.h"
00039 #include "KviRegisteredUserMask.h"
00040 
00041 #include <QObject>
00042 
00043 
00044 //=================================================================================================
00045 //
00046 // KviRegisteredUserDataBase
00047 //
00048 //    Manages a set of KviRegisteredUser instances stored in the m_pUserDict dictionary
00049 //    The users are identified by masks stored in m_pMaskDict and m_pWildMaskList
00050 //    m_pMaskDict contains lists of non wild-nick KviRegisteredUserMask that point to users
00051 //    m_pWildMaskList is a list of wild-nick KviRegisteredUserMask that point to users
00052 //
00053 
00054 class KVILIB_API KviRegisteredUserDataBase : public QObject
00055 {
00056         Q_OBJECT
00057 public:
00058         KviRegisteredUserDataBase();
00059         ~KviRegisteredUserDataBase();
00060 private:
00061         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviRegisteredUser>     * m_pUserDict; // unique namespace, owns the objects, does not copy keys
00062         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviRegisteredUserMaskList> * m_pMaskDict; // owns the objects, copies the keys
00063         KviRegisteredUserMaskList          * m_pWildMaskList; // owns the objects
00064         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviRegisteredUserGroup>* m_pGroupDict;
00065 public:
00066         void copyFrom(KviRegisteredUserDataBase * db);
00067         KviRegisteredUser * addUser(const QString &name); // returns 0 if already there
00068         KviRegisteredUser * getUser(const QString &name); // returns existing or adds
00069         bool removeUser(const QString &name);
00070         bool removeGroup(const QString &name);
00071         KviRegisteredUser * findUserByName(const QString &name){ return m_pUserDict->find(name); };
00072         // mask must be allocated on the heap and the ownership is transferred!
00073         // returns non zero if there is already an user with this mask (returns the pointer to it!)
00074         KviRegisteredUser * addMask(KviRegisteredUser * u,KviIrcMask * mask);
00075         bool removeMaskByPointer(KviIrcMask * mask);
00076         bool removeMask(const KviIrcMask &mask);
00077         KviRegisteredUser * findMatchingUser(const QString &nick,const QString &user,const QString &host);
00078         KviRegisteredUser * findUserWithMask(const KviIrcMask &mask);
00079         KviRegisteredUserMask * findExactMask(const KviIrcMask &mask);
00080         KviRegisteredUserMask * findMatchingMask(const QString &nick,const QString &user,const QString &host);
00081         //Only used in few places (actually one) of the code, but lot of times;perfect for inlining...
00082         //bool isIgnoredUser(const char * nick,const char * user,const char * host);
00083         void load(const QString &filename);
00084         void save(const QString &filename);
00085 
00086         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviRegisteredUser> * userDict(){ return m_pUserDict; };
00087         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviRegisteredUserGroup>* groupDict() { return m_pGroupDict; };
00088 
00089         KviRegisteredUserGroup* addGroup(const QString &name);
00090 signals:
00091         void userRemoved(const QString&);
00092         void userChanged(const QString&);
00093         void userAdded  (const QString&);
00094         void databaseCleared();
00095 };
00096
